# now

**Type Property**

Returns a date instance that represents the current date and time, at the moment of access.

## Declaration

```swift
static var now: Date { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is equivalent to calling [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/init()]. If you assign this value to a variable or property, the assigned value doesn’t automatically update as time passes.
